issue.title: oii.io/gamezizo.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gamezizo.com/game/temple-battle-lightsaber/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

issue.title: www.amazon.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.amazon.com/gp/video/detail/B08GBYWQ6W/ref=atv_dp_season_select_s5?jic=8%7CEgNhbGw%3D](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fgp%2Fvideo%2Fdetail%2FB08GBYWQ6W%2Fref%3Datv_dp_season_select_s5%3Fjic%3D8%257CEgNhbGw%253D) ### Comment > Even with AdGuard enabled, Amazon Prime plays ads of other offerings between episodes. AdGuard fails to disable these ads like it does in YouTube. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/iznj6k7uzj4kckwsg8ko8okc0ck8sowa1uu5h6uemo.jpg?nc=1)

Block trackers DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`

AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)
AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js) Userstyles: | n/a ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&channel=nightly&custom_filters=&dns.bootstraps=&dns.custom_filters=&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_enabled=false&dns.fallbacks=&dns.filters=1&dns.servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.adguard-dns.com%2Fdns-query&dns.timeout=2000&extensions=AdGuard+Assistant+%28script%3B+url%3A+https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fassistant%2F4.3%2Fassistant.user.js%29%2CAdGuard+Popup+Blocker+%28script%3B+url%3A+https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29%2CAdGuard+Extra+%28script%3B+url%3A+https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=1.2.3.4.6.7.8.14.16.17.18.19.20.21.22.105.109.203.224.233.249&product_type=Mac&product_version=2.16.2.1866+nightly&referrer=&scheme_version=3&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.java=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.push=true&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.user_agent=&stealth.webrtc=true&stealth.x_client=true&system_version=MacOS+15.2+%28Build+24C101%29&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fgp%2Fvideo%2Fdetail%2FB08GBYWQ6W%2Fref%3Datv_dp_season_select_s5%3Fjic%3D8%257CEgNhbGw%253D&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Macintosh%3B+Intel+Mac+OS+X+10_15_7%29+AppleWebKit%2F605.1.15+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Version%2F18.2+Safari%2F605.1.15)

comment.body:
Hi, thanks, but the thing is that neither of these 2 tracking filters show up in the filter log, so I can’t unblock the links – but if I manually disable them in AdGuard settings -> Privacy, then the problem does not occur.  And this issue happens whether protection is enabled or disabled for Amazon.

Is there no way to at least disable the entire filters for the site, since whitelisting isn’t working?
